Posts.Content: gapeach wrote: I have a PICC line to get my chemo rather than a port. Is there anyone who has experienced pain around their heart from a PICC? No fever or sign of infection...just an annoying pain. Dx 12/2/2010, IDC, 1cm, Stage I, Grade 3, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply

Posts.Content: Jun 18, 2011 12:48AM gapeach wrote: I have had four rounds of AC and after getting a second opinion at mdanderson, they are recommending 2 more treatments. I will be starting in early July as well. I can truly say that so far, it has not been so bad. Looking forward to being done.
